author: davidlange6
body: hasattr(blah,"a.b.e.d.c") is not valid python syntax for checking if blah.a.b.e.d has attribute c. Fixing though I'm not sure the cascade of hasattr checks in this case is needed HO in 2015 configuration broken without this fix - thanks to Salavat for noticing the problem.
title: fix hasattr lines added in PR3519
